Lore seeker package

Source Adventurer's Armory 2 pg. 5
Price 1000 gp; Weight 44 lbs.
Category Kits

Description

The lore seeker has the equipment necessary to delve into ancient ruins searching for lost knowledge. As this equipment package contains little by way of armor or weapons, it is most appropriate for alchemistsAPG, bards, monks, sorcerers, and wizards. If the PC can cast spells, add a spell component pouch and a holy symbol (if required).
Weapons: Light crossbow with 10 bolts, quarterstaff, silver dagger.
Combat Gear: Alchemist's fire (3), antitoxin, oil of erase, potions of cure light wounds (2), potion of protection from evil, tanglefoot bag, thunderstone.
Other Gear: Backpack, bedroll, belt pouch, candles (5), chalk (5 pieces), compassUE, crowbar, everburning torch, flint and steel, grappling hook, ink, inkpens (2), journalsUE (2), magnifying glass, mapmaker's kitUE, mess kitUE, sack, signal whistle, silk rope (50 ft.), trail rations (5 days), traveler's any-toolUE, waterskin, 8 gp.
Total Weight: 44 lbs. (27-3/4 lbs. for a Small character).
